text: Howard "Howie" Alan Kurtz (born August 1, 1953 in New York City) is a media reporter. He was formerly the host of Cable News Network's media analysis show Reliable Sources. He currently hosts Media Buzz on Fox News Channel. He also is a former media reporter for the Washington Post. == References == Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists from New York City
title: Howard Kurtz
